text: Blair Robson (born 15 May 1935) is a former New Zealand rally driver. He finished second in the 1979 Rally of New Zealand, driving a Ford Escort RS 1800 MKII.http://ewrc-results.com/profile.php?p=38394 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:World Rally Championship drivers Category:New Zealand rally drivers Category:Living people
title: Blair Robson
